enableOilLakeGeneration.comment: When enabled oil lakes will generate in the world

enableGalenaOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, galena ores will generate in the world

enableMetallurgistGeneration.comment: When enabled metallurgist houses can generate in villages

enableSodaliteOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, sodalite ores will generate in the world

enableIridiumOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, iridium ores will generate in the world

enableSphaleriteOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, sphalerite ores will generate in the world

enableRubyOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, ruby ores will generate in the world

enableSheldoniteOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, sheldonite ores will generate in the world

enablePyriteOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, pyrite ores will generate in the world

enablePeridotOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, peridot ores will generate in the world

enableElectricianGeneration.comment: When enabled electrician houses can generate in villages

enableRubberTreeGeneration.comment: When enabled rubber trees will generate in the world

enableTungstenOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, tungsten ores will generate in the world

enableOreGeneration.comment: When enabled ores will generate in the world

enableSapphireOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, sapphire ores will generate in the world

enableSilverOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, silver ores will generate in the world

enableCinnabarOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, cinnabar ores will generate in the world

enableBauxiteOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, bauxite ores will generate in the world

enableLeadOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, lead ores will generate in the world

enableTinOreGeneration.comment: When enabled and enableOreGeneration isn't disabled, tin ores will generate in the world

enableEndLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to The End loot chests.

enableNetherLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to Nether loot chests.

enableOverworldLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add ingots, machine frames and circuits to OverWorld loot chests.

enableFishingJunkLoot.comment: When true TechReborn will add items to fishing junk loot.
